mapper.select: select documents_seq,a.project_seq,page_num,documents_item1,documents_item2,documents_item3,documents_item4,documents_item5, documents_content1,documents_content2,documents_content3,documents_content4,documents_content5, c.user_seq as team_leader from documents a left outer join project b on a.project_seq = b.project_seq left outer join team_member c on b.team_id = c.team_id and c.team_leader = 'Y' where a.project_seq = #{projectSeq} and a.page_num = 1;

insert into documents(project_seq,page_num,documents_name,documents_item1,documents_item2,documents_item3,documents_item4,documents_item5,documents_content1,documents_content2,documents_content3,documents_content4,documents_content5) values(#{projectSeq},1,'프로젝트 기획안', '이름', '타이틀', '주제', '내용', '구체화방향','프로젝트 이름', '프로젝트 제목', '프로젝트 주제', '프로젝트 내용', '프로젝트 내용을 구현하기 위한 기능');

update documents set documents_name = #{documentsName}, documents_item1 = #{documentsItem1}, documents_item2 = #{documentsItem2}, documents_item3 = #{documentsItem3}, documents_item4 = #{documentsItem4}, documents_item5 = #{documentsItem5}, documents_content1 = #{documentsContent1}, documents_content2 = #{documentsContent2}, documents_content3 = #{documentsContent3}, documents_content4 = #{documentsContent4}, documents_content5 = #{documentsContent5}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_time = now() where documents_seq = #{documentsSeq};

update documents set documents_name = '프로젝트 기획안', documents_item1 = '이름', documents_item2 = '타이틀', documents_item3 = '주제', documents_item4 = '내용', documents_item5 = '구체화 방향', documents_content1 = '프로젝트 이름', documents_content2 = '프로젝트 제목', documents_content3 = '프로젝트 주제', documents_content4 = '프로젝트 내용', documents_content5 = '프로젝트 내용을 구현하기 위한 기능', create_date = #{createDate}, update_time = now() where documents_seq = #{documentsSeq};
